quote: You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future. You have to trust in something - your gut, destiny, life, karma, whatever. This approach has never let me down, and it has made all the difference in my life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The secret of your future is hidden in your daily routine.
author: Mike Murdock

quote: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: A person often meets his destiny on the road he took to avoid it.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: The future rewards those who press on. I don't have time to feel sorry for myself. I don't have time to complain. I'm going to press on.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Prediction is very difficult, especially if it's about the future.
author: Niels Bohr

quote: The youth is the hope of our future.
author: Jose Rizal

quote: Fear not for the future, weep not for the past.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: Never let the future disturb you. You will meet it, if you have to, with the same weapons of reason which today arm you against the present.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: I don't know what the future may hold, but I know who holds the future.
author: Ralph Abernathy

quote: Destiny is no matter of chance. It is a matter of choice. It is not a thing to be waited for, it is a thing to be achieved.
author: William Jennings Bryan

quote: The future starts today, not tomorrow.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: If you think in terms of a year, plant a seed; if in terms of ten years, plant trees; if in terms of 100 years, teach the people.
author: Confucius

quote: If we open a quarrel between past and present, we shall find that we have lost the future.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The only difference between the saint and the sinner is that every saint has a past, and every sinner has a future.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Let the future tell the truth, and evaluate each one according to his work and accomplishments. The present is theirs; the future, for which I have really worked, is mine.
author: Nikola Tesla

quote: Let us put our minds together and see what life we can make for our children.
author: Sitting Bull

quote: The reason people find it so hard to be happy is that they always see the past better than it was, the present worse than it is, and the future less resolved than it will be.
author: Marcel Pagnol

quote: The future is always beginning now.
author: Mark Strand

quote: I look to the future because that's where I'm going to spend the rest of my life.
author: George Burns

quote: You can never plan the future by the past.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: The distinction between the past, present and future is only a stubbornly persistent illusion.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: One faces the future with one's past.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: Control your own destiny or someone else will.
author: Jack Welch

quote: I have realized that the past and future are real illusions, that they exist in the present, which is what there is and all there is.
author: Alan Watts

quote: The future ain't what it used to be.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: There is always one moment in childhood when the door opens and lets the future in.
author: Graham Greene

quote: Without forgiveness, there's no future.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: What we need to do is always lean into the future; when the world changes around you and when it changes against you - what used to be a tail wind is now a head wind - you have to lean into that and figure out what to do because complaining isn't a strategy.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: The best years of your life are the ones in which you decide your problems are your own. You do not blame them on your mother, the ecology, or the president. You realize that you control your own destiny.
author: Albert Ellis

quote: The factory of the future will have only two employees, a man and a dog. The man will be there to feed the dog. The dog will be there to keep the man from touching the equipment.
author: Warren Bennis

quote: Look not mournfully into the past, it comes not back again. Wisely improve the present, it is thine. Go forth to meet the shadowy future without fear and with a manly heart.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Life is divided into three terms - that which was, which is, and which will be. Let us learn from the past to profit by the present, and from the present, to live better in the future.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Neither a wise man nor a brave man lies down on the tracks of history to wait for the train of the future to run over him.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Map out your future - but do it in pencil. The road ahead is as long as you make it. Make it worth the trip.
author: Jon Bon Jovi

quote: In this bright future you can't forget your past.
author: Bob Marley

quote: The future influences the present just as much as the past.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: There is nothing like a dream to create the future.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Only you can control your future.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: There is never time in the future in which we will work out our salvation. The challenge is in the moment; the time is always now.
author: James Baldwin

quote: My interest is in the future because I am going to spend the rest of my life there.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: The most glorious moments in your life are not the so-called days of success, but rather those days when out of dejection and despair you feel rise in you a challenge to life, and the promise of future accomplishments.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Even though the future seems far away, it is actually beginning right now.
author: Mattie Stepanek

quote: I'm not sure what the future holds but I do know that I'm going to be positive and not wake up feeling desperate. As my dad said 'Nic, it is what it is, it's not what it should have been, not what it could have been, it is what it is.'
author: Nicole Kidman

quote: Real generosity toward the future lies in giving all to the present.
author: Albert Camus

quote: I know of no way of judging the future but by the past.
author: Patrick Henry

quote: Our human compassion binds us the one to the other - not in pity or patronizingly, but as human beings who have learnt how to turn our common suffering into hope for the future.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: When the past no longer illuminates the future, the spirit walks in darkness.
author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: America's future will be determined by the home and the school. The child becomes largely what he is taught; hence we must watch what we teach, and how we live.
author: Jane Addams

quote: Choose your friends with caution; plan your future with purpose, and frame your life with faith.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: If future generations are to remember us more with gratitude than sorrow, we must achieve more than just the miracles of technology. We must also leave them a glimpse of the world as it was created, not just as it looked when we got through with it.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Elegance is not the prerogative of those who have just escaped from adolescence, but of those who have already taken possession of their future.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: If you do not think about your future, you cannot have one.
author: John Galsworthy

quote: Yesterday is a cancelled check. Today is cash on the line. Tomorrow is a promissory note.
author: Hank Stram

quote: There's no present. There's only the immediate future and the recent past.
author: George Carlin

quote: We must welcome the future, remembering that soon it will be the past; and we must respect the past, remembering that it was once all that was humanly possible.
author: George Santayana

quote: Destiny has two ways of crushing us - by refusing our wishes and by fulfilling them.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: I don't try to describe the future. I try to prevent it.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: Never make predictions, especially about the future.
author: Casey Stengel
